Package DAO

Interface DivisionDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
DivisionDaoImpl
public interface DivisionDao
This is the "Division DAO" class. This class acts as an Interface for the "Division DAO Implementation" class.
Author:
Lydia Strough

  • Method Details

    • getAllDivisions

      javafx.collections.ObservableList<Division> getAllDivisions()
      This is the "get all Divisions" method. This method accesses the database and returns all divisions. Each division is then added to an observable list, "allDivisions".
      Returns:
      allDivisions list

    • getDivision

      Division getDivision(int divisionId)
      This is the "get division" method. This method searches the database for a specific division based on its unique division ID.
      Parameters:
      divisionId - the division ID in question
      Returns:
      the specific divisions' information

    • getDivisionsByCountry

      javafx.collections.ObservableList<Division> getDivisionsByCountry(int countryId)
      This is the "get divisions by country" method. This method accesses the database and filters the list of divisions based on their related country ID.
      Parameters:
      countryId - the divisions' country ID
      Returns:
      the "divisionsByCountry" list

    • updateDivisionName

      int updateDivisionName(String currentDivisionName, int countryId, String newDivisionName)
      This is the "update division name" method.

      This method searches the database for a specific division by their division name and country ID, and then updates the divisions' division name.

      Parameters:
      currentDivisionName - the division in questions' current division name
      countryId - the division in questions' country ID
      newDivisionName - the division in questions' desired new division name
      Returns:
      the number of affected database rows

    • updateDivisionCountry

      int updateDivisionCountry(String divisionName, int currentCountryId, int newCountryId)
      This is the "update division country ID" method.

      This method searched the database for a specific division by their division name and country ID, and then updates the divisions' country ID.

      Parameters:
      divisionName - the division in questions' division name
      currentCountryId - the division in questions' current country ID
      newCountryId - the division in questions' desired new country ID
      Returns:
      the number of affected database rows

    • deleteDivision

      int deleteDivision(int divisionId, String divisionName)
      This is the "delete division" method. This method accesses the database and deletes a division with a specific division name and division ID.
      Parameters:
      divisionId - the division in questions' division ID
      divisionName - the division in questions' division name
      Returns:
      the number of affected database rows

    • addDivision

      int addDivision(String divisionName, int countryId)
      This is the "add division" method. This method accesses the database and adds a division with the desired division name and country ID.
      Parameters:
      divisionName - the desired divisions' division name
      countryId - the desired divisions' country ID
      Returns:
      the number of affected database rows
